New Records: This is statistically the biggest upset in European Championship history.
Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz took advantage of a horror defensive error to put Slovakia ahead in the seventh minute.
Romelu Lukaku had two goals ruled out by VAR, first for offside in the 56th minute and then for a handball in the build-up in the 86th minute.
Slovakia held on to claim a 1-0 victory over Belgium.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium lose their opening game in a group they will feel like they should have got nine points from.
Slovakia give themselves a brilliant chance at making the last 16, and perhaps even qualifying top of Group E!
